resources.string: This app was not developed by LanguageTool.org. It uses the official public API for text checking.
Without Premium subscription, this app also shows hidden rules returned from the server, but the matches don\'t include suggestions or explanations. Upgrade to Premium or host the server yourself.

The free API is limited to 20 requests per minute per IP address. Because of that, you can check the text only every 6 seconds, so you don\'t block the IP (you may not be alone using the app). Premium limits are much higher. If you set a username and API key (e.g. use premium) or use custom BE url, the rate-limit will be almost removed.
The picky mode checks your text with additional rules. Use it to check formal texts.
The language is detected automatically. Make sure the language you are trying to use is supported by LanguageTool. For example, Czech is not supported, so it may be detected as Slovak.

This app also supports the system spellchecker (don't get confused with autocorrection). 
 To enable the spellchecker, open your settings and go to the section Language & Input → Spellchecker. Select LanguageTool Unofficial as your default spellchecker. 
 You may encounter problems on some devices because the Android ecosystem is diverse. Some of my devices support this, some don't. Also, some keyboards ignore or don't support third-party spell checkers. 
 If you encounter problems, please report them, but most likely they cannot be resolved. 
 You can copy and paste text into this app.
